channel.title: multiple ver of Torbrowser unstable?
channel.description: in the past 2 weeks I have noticed that tb in whonix seems to be less stable. I now regularly get crashed tabs on pretty much every site I try to visit. So far I have tried to rm -r the ~/.tb dir and reinstall different versions of the browser but I still seem to be having the same problem. #1 Is anyone else having issues? #2 I assume there is a log being generated somewhere, can someone let know where so I can post it and perahsp get some more insite? thx

item.title: multiple ver of Torbrowser unstable?
item.dc:creator: jbwihokkc
item.description:
Thx.
Ironically I removed tbb again, downloaded it again, and started it up. and it has stayed stable, didnâ€™t even have to do anything? But if it comes back I will try their suggestion!

Read full topic

item.title: multiple ver of Torbrowser unstable?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi jbwihokkc

I know of at least one similar issue that is being tracked on TBB bugs. The user is experiencing crashes that affects multiple versions of TorBrowser. It is possible that the issue you are having is related.

https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/24040

To view your log files:

cat /var/log/tor/log

To continually view new logs:

tail -f /var/log/tor/log

Read full topic

item.title: multiple ver of Torbrowser unstable?
item.dc:creator: jbwihokkc
item.description:
in the past 2 weeks I have noticed that tb in whonix seems to be less stable. I now regularly get crashed tabs on pretty much every site I try to visit.
So far I have tried to rm -r the ~/.tb dir and reinstall different versions of the browser but I still seem to be having the same problem.
#1 Is anyone else having issues?
#2 I assume there is a log being generated somewhere, can someone let know where so I can post it and perahsp get some more insite?
thx

Read full topic
